sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Schtroumpf } from '../schtroumpf'; import { UserService } from '../_services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { schtroumpfs?: Schtroumpf[]; constructor(private userService: UserService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.userService.getSchtroumpfs().subscribe((schtroumpfs) => (this.schtroumpfs = schtroumpfs)); } }
